posts.post_title: FS - Three Ross Helm's SLers - SGC 2.5, 3.0 and 4.0 take your pick!
posts.post_content:
For Sale - Three Ross Helm's a relatively lower population SLer.  Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.  

T206 Ross Helm P350 - SGC 4  Razor sharp, $370 venmo no fee or $382.50 pp gs.

T206 Ross Helm Old Mill - SGC 3  $270 venmo no fee or $277.50 pp gs

T206 Ross Helm P350 - SGC 2.5  Great condition for a 2.5, $250 venmo no fee or $257.50
